name: Santa Mania
description:
Description:
• Control Santa with Mouse right or left and collect as many presents as you can. Avoid crows and do not forget to get the jetpack as soon as you see it! You can always jump again by clicking Santa Clause! Fun game for all ages! :)

Instructions:
Move with Mouse.
Click Santa to start the game.

Game Dimensions: 600x400

Game Category: Action, Adventure, Education, Strategy, Other

Movement: Mouse
Fire / Action: Not Available
Jump: Not Available
